android.app
类 ProgressDialog

java.lang.Object
  android.app.Dialog
      android.app.AlertDialog
          android.app.ProgressDialog
所有已实现的接口：
DialogInterface, KeyEvent.Callback, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, Window.Callback
public class ProgressDialog
extends AlertDialog

A dialog showing a progress indicator and an optional text message or view. Only a text message or a view can be used at the same time.

The dialog can be made cancelable on back key press.

The progress range is 0..10000.

字段详细信息

STYLE_SPINNER

public static final int STYLE_SPINNER
Creates a ProgressDialog with a ciruclar, spinning progress bar. This is the default.

setProgressNumberFormat

public void setProgressNumberFormat(String format)
Change the format of Progress Number. The default is "current/max". Should not be called during the number is progressing.

参数：
format - Should contain two "%d". The first is used for current number and the second is used for the maximum.
